name: Wildlife & Wonders Tour
description: Visit one of the natural wonders of the world - the mighty Victoria Falls! The widest curtain of falling water - watch as millions of litres of water cascade into a chasm 1700 metres wide and 108 metres at it's deepest. Welcome to Mosi-oa-Tunya - The Smoke that Thunders! First seen by Scottish missionary and explorer David Livingstone on 16 November 1855, the Victoria Falls is a must on any bucket list
